summary: Measures of well-being show many girls are struggling. Plus, how they're treated and disciplined in school can have profound effects that last into adulthood. This report examined discipline disparities among girls in public schools. Among girls, Black girls faced more and harsher forms of discipline than others. We found that Black girls received harsher punishments than White girls, even for similar infractions. Our analysis of...
title: K-12 Education: Nationally, Black Girls Receive More Frequent and More Severe Discipline in School Than Other Girls
